mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Lect_TB(lecturerName, placeName, capCnt, dateTimeStamp, lectDesc) VALUES(#{lecturerName}, #{placeName}, #{capCnt}, #{dateTimeStamp}, #{lectDesc})
mapper.select: SELECT lecturerName, empNo FROM lect_emp_tb ORDER BY lecturerName, empNo
SELECT * FROM Lect_TB WHERE dateTimeStamp > = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-7,'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') ORDER BY dateTimeStamp desc
SELECT lecturerName FROM lect_Emp_TB WHERE empNo = #{empNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM lect_Emp_TB WHERE lecturerName = #{lecturerName} AND empNo = #{empNo}
mapper.select: SELECT e.lecturerName as lecturerName FROM Lect_TB t, lect_emp_tb e WHERE dateTimeStamp BETWEEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-3,'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MI') AND t.lecturerName = e.lecturerName GROUP BY e.lecturerName ORDER BY COUNT(*) desc
SELECT count(*) FROM lect_emp_tb WHERE lecturerName = #{lecturerName} and empNo = #{empNo}
